programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: College student Beca (Anna Kendrick) knows she does not want to be part of a clique, but that's exactly where she finds herself after arriving at her new school. Thrust in among mean gals, nice gals and just plain weird gals, Beca finds that the only thing they have in common is how well they sing together. She takes the women of the group out of their comfort zone of traditional arrangements and into a world of amazing harmonic combinations in a fight to the top of college music competitions.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: It's been three years since the Barden Bellas (Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson) became the first all-female group to win a national title. All seems well until a botched Lincoln Center performance for the president leads to a scandal that strips them of their performing duties, causing internal tension and strife. With the world championships on the horizon in Copenhagen, Denmark, the women must get their act together for their one and only shot at redemption.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there aren't job prospects for making music with your mouth. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, the group of nerds comes together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: High-school student Bella Swan, always a bit of a misfit, doesn't expect life to change much when she moves from sunny Arizona to rainy Washington state. Then she meets Edward Cullen, a handsome but mysterious teen whose eyes seem to peer directly into her soul. Edward is a vampire whose family does not drink blood, and Bella, far from being frightened, enters into a dangerous romance with her immortal soulmate.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: Danger once again surrounds Bella, as a string of mysterious killings terrorizes Seattle and a malicious vampire continues her infernal quest for revenge. Amid the tumult, Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob, knowing that her decision may ignite the long-simmering feud between vampire and werewolf.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: At last, Bella and Edward are getting married. When Jacob finds out that Bella wants to spend her honeymoon as a human, he is horrified, for Edward's passion could accidentally kill her. Bella does indeed survive her honeymoon, but a new complication arises when she discovers that she's pregnant, and the child is growing at an alarming rate. The pregnancy sets the wolves against Bella and Edward, but Jacob vows to protect his friend.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
programme.desc: Bella awakes, as a vampire, from her life-threatening labor, and her newborn daughter, Renesmee, proves to be very special indeed. While Bella adjusts to her new state of being, Renesmee experiences accelerated growth. When the Volturi learn of the baby's existence, they declare her to be an abomination and sentence the Cullens to death. Bella, Edward and the rest of the clan seek help from allies around the world to protect their family.

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: When famed photographer Christina Eames dies unexpectedly, she leaves her estranged daughter, Mae, hurt, angry and full of questions. When Mae finds a photograph tucked away in a safe-deposit box, she soon finds herself delving into her mother's early life -- an investigation that leads to an unexpected romance with a rising journalist.

programme.title: Celebrity Beef
programme.desc: Cheryl Hines and Rachael Harris aim to settle their beef via a cook-off in a good cop vs. bad cop battle, hosted by Joel McHale.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: DJ Qualls is stunned by a life-changing reading with Tyler; Boy George refuses to accept Tyler's prediction about his love life; Tyler gives Rob Dyrdek an accurate medical reading; a message leaves Charisma Carpenter in tears.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler brings through critical instructions from Omarosa's late fiance; Carmen Electra's sister comes through bringing much needed closure; Ashley Hamilton is left in awe; RJ Mitte seeks Tyler's help unveiling a mysterious presence.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Melissa Joan Hart turns from skeptic to believer; Madison Beer becomes star-struck; Tyler travels to New Jersey to meet with Snooki's family.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry

programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's greatest companion and a parent's greatest ally. Designed by Gemma, a brilliant roboticist, M3GAN can listen, watch and learn as it plays the role of friend and teacher, playmate and protector. When Gemma becomes the unexpected caretaker of her 8-year-old niece, she decides to give the girl a M3GAN prototype, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Warriors host the Nuggets at the Chase Center. David Adelman, the son of former NBA bench boss Rick, begins his first full season as Denver head coach. The Nuggets traded Michael Porter Jr. to the Nets for Cameron Johnson in the offseason.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett (Mark Wahlberg) was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted (Seth MacFarlane), his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori (Mila Kunis), John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Life has changed drastically for thunder buddies John (Mark Wahlberg), now a bachelor, and best pal Ted (Seth MacFarlane), now married to the woman (Jessica Barth) of his dreams. Problems arise when the couple decide to adopt a child, but the law declares Ted to be property and not a person. Angry and dejected, the lovably foulmouthed teddy bear must now seek legal help from a young lawyer (Amanda Seyfried) and a legendary, civil-rights attorney (Morgan Freeman) to get the justice he deserves.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished; trying to help some teens, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now, David's in big debt to his supplier and to wipe the slate clean, he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: He packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

It's up to the other members of the Wolfpack to get him through his personal crisis by embarking on a road trip to the place it all began: Las Vegas.

programme.title: Sommersby
programme.desc: A man presumed dead shows up after six years, but he may be an imposter, and could choose to hang for murder rather than reveal the truth.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: A life affirming story of sisterhood, love and loss. Two sisters travel across Europe to find themselves.

programme.title: Give Them Wings
programme.desc: Give Them Wings is based on the true story of wheelchair bound Paul Hodgson. A man who fought back and won.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: Chloe, a young woman who has been searching for something to believe in, is living on the streets of New York City. She comes face to face with an Inuit Eskimo named Theo, who was sent By his elders to send a message to humankind.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro & Tim Robbins star in this war zone comedy where a band of rescue workers are confronted with a crisis.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned during the Sudanese Civil War, a group of young refugees are given the opportunity to leave their camp and resettle in America.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: While fighting in Vietnam, Dalton hears his girlfriend back home has dumped him. He has a week's leave coming up so decides to fly to get her back. AWOL from the war zone, he has seven days to get back to the US, change his girlfriend's mind and make it back to Vietnam without anyone noticing.

programme.title: Daliland
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Sir Ben Kingsley stars as the great surrealist artist, Salvador Dali. In 1970s New York, Dali enjoys the latter stage of his career with a lifestyle filled with luxury and extravagant parties.

programme.title: Little Accidents
programme.desc: Both dramatic and suspenseful, Little Accidents shows the different ways in which people respond to tragedy.

programme.title: Mother and Child
programme.desc: Naomi Watts, Annette Bening , Kerry Washington, Jimmy Smits and Samuel L. Jackson star in a moving story of three women and the power of the unbreakable bond between mother and child.

programme.title: Fame
programme.desc: In this soaring and inspiring reinvention of the Oscar®-Winning hit film Fame (1980), a group of highly gifted dancers,singers, musicians and actors at the New York City High School of Performing Arts strive to live out their dreams and shine!

programme.title: Vita & Virginia
programme.desc: It's the fascinating true story about the love affair between socialite and popular author Vita Sackville-West and literary icon Virginia Woolf, and the love story that inspired Virginia Woolf's Orlando. Starring Gemma Arterton, Elizabeth Debicki and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: Forever In My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs—back home or in the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Once upon a time, screenwriter Keith Michaels was on top of the world. But now, he's divorced, broke and hasn't written a hit film in years. His attitude slowly begins to turn when he meets Holly, a single mum.

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton's iconic idol, true love.

programme.title: A Rainy Day in New York
programme.desc: Woody Allen's romantic comedy A RAINY DAY IN NEW YORK tells the story of college sweethearts, Gatsby (Timothée Chalamet) and Ashleigh (Elle Fanning), whose plans for a romantic weekend together in New York City are dashed as quickly as the sunlight turns into showers.

programme.title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: From the day Pauline (Clemence Poésy) lends him a helping hand on the bus, the stubborn and weary Matthew Morgan (Sir Michael Caine) stumbles back to happiness.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Celebrated and adored by millions, she was the Queen of people's hearts, yet the bittersweet story of the last man to truly capture hers has never before. In a story that until now has remained untold, Diana introduces a time in the Princess's life that was important in shaping her final years...

programme.title: As I Am
programme.desc: One week of school remains for Kai, an aspiring writer, and his friends. How they spend this time will cost one of them their life and leave them changed forever.

programme.title: A Case Of You
programme.desc: A young writer (Justin Long) woos a cute and quirky barista (Evan Rachel Wood) by studying her Facebook profile and making himself into the man of her dreams. When she falls for his alter ego, he must keep up the act or risk losing her.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: The tumultuous political landscape of Paris in 1968 is the backdrop as three young cineastes are drawn together through their passion for film.

programme.title: The Big Wedding
programme.desc: With an all-star cast led by Robert DeNiro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried with Susan Sarandon and Robin Williams, THE BIG WEDDING is an romantic comedy about a charmingly modern family trying to survive a weekend wedding celebration that has the potential to become a family fiasco.

programme.title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: From the day Pauline (Clemence Poésy) lends him a helping hand on the bus, the stubborn and weary Matthew Morgan (Sir Michael Caine) stumbles back to happiness.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: CLASS RANK is a funny and touching coming-of-age drama in the vein of Election, Easy A or Legally Blonde, from the director of Glee...

programme.title: Electric Jesus
programme.desc: When a promoter sells a Christian metal band on the promise of a summer tour in 1986, their desire to "make Jesus famous" meets the complexities and confusion of personal ambition, youthful zeal, lifelong friendships, and first love.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: When the wedding of super star Lara Tyler (Alice Eve - Bombshell) to tweedy English author James Arber (David Tennant – Doctor Who) is sabotaged by paparazzi, they decide to relocate the event to the one place where the world's press won't find them.

programme.title: Before You Know It
programme.desc: An unmissable New-York- based “dramedy” in the vein of Woody Allen. Stage manager Rachel (Hannah Pearl Utt) is the only thing standing between her family and utter chaos. She then discovers that her presumed-dead mother (Judith Light: Transparent) is alive and thriving as a soap-opera star!

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Everything is running smoothly for popular radio DJ Dr. Emma Lloyd in the run up to her own wedding when she makes the shocking discovery: she's already married – and to someone else!

programme.title: Tangerine
programme.desc: In this acclaimed indie, a working girl tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

programme.title: Cheap Thrills
programme.desc: Craig loses his low-wage job. He heads to a bar and encounters an old friend. The two are roped into a round of drinks by a wealthy couple who engages them in a series of innocent dares in exchange for money. It seems like easy and much needed money, but how far are they willing to go for money?

programme.title: The Grand Duke of Corsica
programme.desc: A cantankerous and brilliant architect, Alfred Rott, embarks upon a highly unusual commission for an eccentric billionaire in Malta who calls himself the ‘Grand Duke of Corsica'. A deadly malaria epidemic sweeps the island causing panic, but Alfred remains to finish the job.

programme.title: Sam & Kate
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award®-winners Dustin Hoffman and Sissy Spacek, Sam & Kate is a heartwarming, multi-generational family story bringing together four people who are given a second chance at love, and life.

programme.desc: Periwinkle, a vain Pixie, is upset when her magic mirror tells her that Vanity is the fairest, not she. Periwinkle kidnaps Vanity, but the rest of the Smurfs come to Vanity's rescue. Periwinkle sees the error of her ways and they become friends.

programme.title: The Smurfomatic Smurfolator
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel still wants to destroy the Smurfs. This time, he sends on the forest the seeds of a creeping weed that is sure to entangle all the Smurfs… But Handy Smurf has devised a smurfomatic smurfolator...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth Smurf: Plotting to rid himself of the Smurfs, Gargamel casts a spell over Bigmouth and disguises himself as a Smurf. Thinking he is a Smurf, Bigmouth nearly succeeds in wrecking everything in the Village of the Smurfs until Papa Smurf comes up with a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfiest Of Friends
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf had one friend: Clumsy Smurf. But poor Clumsy is so, well, clumsy, that Brainy refuses to see him again. So now he is left without anyone willing to listen to him. Maybe Buddy, the good-looking imp met by chance near the Great Oak can be a pal for Brainy....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's Enchanted Didey: When Gargamel is able to make a flying carpet out of a patchwork quilt, accidents are bound to happen...The result of one accident is that a piece of the flying bedspread is used as Baby Smurf's diaper, with very surprising results...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's New Job: At last here is a post worthy of the great Gargamel's talent and experience! At least, that's what the evil wizard thinks as he learns of Prince Theodore's need of a new court magician. The Smurfs are delighted when they see Gargamel and his good-for-nothing apprentice, Scruple, leaving their hovel in the forest. But maybe they are rejoicing too soon. Who knows what peril Gargamel has in store?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Scarlet Croaker: Greenpeedeepee Swamp is the only place you can find Swamp Root, the delicious and necessary ingredient of Greedy Smurf's famed swamp root stew. Unfortunately, it is also one place where you can find those hideous Wartmongers. Even though Sassette and the Smurfs save a young Wartmonger's life, they still end up being captured by the others. But the Scarlet Croaker will save them! Maybe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Horn Of Plenty
programme.desc: Mother Nature always does her best, but this time she's gone wrong. Her wand gets the wrong results and she accidentally damages the Autumn harvest. Now the Smurfs and all the forest animals face a lean and hungry winter. The only place where the Smurfs could get food would be the Land of Plenty. But Gargamel steals the famed Horn of Plenty to lure the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Locomotive Smurfs: Handy Smurf has hit on a revolutionary new idea: a sort of smurfless carriage that moves on railroad tracks. He calls it a railsmurfer and it makes for less work in the Village... until Gargamel chances upon it.

programme.title: Jokey's Joke Book
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf's joke boxes are no longer funny to the other Smurfs. Jokey finds new ideas in his Great Joke Book, but these ideas are even less popular in the Village. And here comes the evil Gargamel with a few jokes of his own...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfing For Gold: Gargamel the evil wizard is in trouble again. If he can't find an enormous amount of gold by sundown, all his possessions will be taken away from him. But the Smurfs are going to help their arch-enemy... Up to a point.

programme.title: Skyscraper Smurfs
programme.desc: Sure, a village of mushroom-shaped houses is nice and jolly... But not very modern, in Architect Smurf's view. What the Smurfs need is smurfdominium, a new, daring concept that will change the art of living forever...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crooner Smurf: Harmony Smurf is no longer wanted in the Smurf Choir: his singing is too far off-key. But Papa Smurf gives him an amulet that will make him a vocal virtuoso. Now here comes Hogatha...

programme.title: All The News That's Fit To Smurf
programme.desc: Curious Smurf has an idea: why not print a sheet with all the Village news? He's sure to interest all his readers of the Smurf Tattler. But things don't go exactly to plan when Papa finds super smurfberries.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Flighty's Plight: Flighty Smurf, as his name implies, can't make his own mind up about anything. The other Smurfs take him to the forest for a survival test in which he can find his way home only by making decisions. He ends up in Balthazar's castle.

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Wild About Smurfette: With Chitter his favourite squirrel mysteriously gone away, Wild Smurf feels very lonely. He haunts the Village despondently and his eyes light up only when Smurfette is about. The other Smurfs notice a sudden interest from Smurfette too...

programme.title: Vanity's Wild Adventure
programme.desc: Vanity Smurf is a finicky dresser he takes care of his good looks and would do his utmost to avoid the tiniest grain of dust that might soil his attire. Wild Smurf is... Well, he's sort of wild. When both of them spend some time together, sparks fly...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fastest Wizard In The World: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has come to the somewhat obvious conclusion that if he were a little faster on his feet, he'd be able to catch more Smurfs. He concocts a new formula while, in the Village, the Smurfs are wishing that Wild Smurf could slow down a little bit...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Root Of Evil: If there is one thing that the evil sorceress Chlorhydris cannot abide, it is other people's happiness. The spectacle of the Smurfs' gentle and song-filled life gets Chlorhydsis' hackles up. She must destroy that tinkling laughter, smother those happy repartees... She plants the root of evil in the forest and soon, no Smurf is on speaking terms with another. Baby Smurf is the only one untouched...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Journey To The Centre Of The Smurf: Winter is setting in on the Village of the Smurfs. The little Smurfs are freezing. But what is Clumsy doing with this strange rock he's discovered? And why is Miner Smurf so enthusiastic about their new discovery? Surely, one more addition to Clumsy's rock collection is not worth all this hoopla... The Smurfs will discover danger and surprises when they go underground.

programme.title: Scruple's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Brenda, the little witch, feels rejected: no-one is taking her to this year's Broomstick Ball. Oh, if she could find some nice-looking boy... Then she meets Scruple, apprentice of the evil wizard Gargamel. He's so handsome, and available too! What she does not know is that Scruple's only interest is her magic wand. What the Smurfs know is that they're going to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clumsy's Cloud: It's not his fault. Clumsy Smurf never stops causing catastrophes, and even when Papa Smurf sends him to the forest on a single errand, he brings back a cloud of bad luck the shadow of which causes misfortune to anyone – or any Smurf – under it... Papa Smurf is going to need all his resources to find a cure: the silver lining that every dark cloud ought to have!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Worrywarts: Papa Smurf's worries make him break into a rash of worrywarts. The only way to relieve him of his bout of indecision-inducing disease is to have him rub the horn of a Wartmonger, a sloppy, slimy, stupid and brutal enemy of the Pussywillow Pixies...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Slumber Party: Poor Lazy! All he wants is a good night's rest. But no, all the Smurfs throw a party for him and, what's more, he gets dragged into a silly argument about painting giant Bigmouth's toes a bright tangerine red... It's a long, sleepless night for poor Lazy Smurf!

programme.title: Smurf Box Derby
programme.desc: Handy Smurf makes another invention: the Smurfmobile. Each Smurf has his – or her – customized vehicle and all, or almost all, the Smurfs enjoy a little spin... But then the evil wizard Gargamel gets hold of the idea and starts making trouble for the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Blue Eye Returns: This time, Gargamel's sinister plan works too well. He just wanted a slight flood to drown the Smurfs. But this is almost the end of the world, and the Smurfs have to build an ark to survive... Will Smurfette's friend, the little winged horse, arrive on time?

programme.title: Babes In Wartland
programme.desc: Baby Smurf, playing hide-and-seek, hides in a basket that gets thrown in the river... Baby Smurf floats to the land of the Pussywillow Pixies... But the nasty, stupid Wartmonger reacts strangely to Baby...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf-Walk Cafe: The latest invention of both Greedy and Handy Smurf: a soft, refreshing delicacy that they call Smurf cream but that we humans know as ice cream. All would be well if rivalry did not come between the two Smurfs... And if Gargamel did not do his best to be unpleasant!

programme.title: The Bad Place
programme.desc: What is this little moon coming from above? Why, it's a crater-pockmarked globe of mud inhabited by the Grimeys, a family of mud-splattering, mud-eating creatures from out there in the sky. Not all the Smurfs are enthusiastic about the visitors....

programme.title: Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
programme.desc: Periwinkle, a vain Pixie, is upset when her magic mirror tells her that Vanity is the fairest, not she. Periwinkle kidnaps Vanity, but the rest of the Smurfs come to Vanity's rescue. Periwinkle sees the error of her ways and they become friends.

programme.title: Robocar Poli
programme.desc: While Terry is carrying loads, his brake becomes out of order so he runs very fast on the roads. Can Poli and the Rescue Team help Terry stop?

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern give new life to a '57 Chevy Bel Air that was pulled from a junkyard after more than 30 years. The guys drop in a small-block V8 and turbo 350 to get the car back on the pavement for a bumpy road trip back to where it came from.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan meet up with Derek Bieri to take a 1968 big-block Dart on a tire-smoking road trip, which includes a final run down Memphis International Raceway and some high-speed passes down George Ray's Wildcat Dragstrip.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Street racers battle at rough, untested tracks across the country and earn points depending on how they perform.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: With added scenes and bonus features; Bracket 3 racers hope to stay in the competition; Smoke wants a rematch with Petey Small Block; Lizzy and Boosted must run again due to a flagging error; Dennis Bailey and Jason Kowalsky represent MSO.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: In the fourth and final round, Murder Nova, Scott Taylor and both Boddies make their first runs; Boosted must make difficult decisions, Jerry Bird faces nitrous problems, and Boddie Jr. races against a former teammate.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Four Bracket 4 losers, including Murder Nova, Doc, Jerry Bird and Stephen Chase, face car issues as they get another chance; Jerry still needs help with his nitrous, James Strang struggles to get going, and Jim Howe battles electrical issues.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: The sixteen racers in the winners' bracket compete to remain undefeated; Boddie Jr. faces a protest from his teammate, Shelby proves age is just a number, and Tricia battles car problems before a big matchup.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Sixteen racers compete to move on to the next round and win the $100,000 prize; Brandon James defends his title, while Dave and Murder Nova represent the 405; two MSO racers face off.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Red Line
programme.desc: Racers in the losers' bracket must win additional matches to stay in the game; teammates from California and Memphis face each other, with Murder Nova getting a rematch.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Mega Cash Days
programme.desc: As six racers move into the final night of racing, Brandon James fights for a repeat win, youngster Shelby continues to impress and Bobby gets challenged for jumping on every race; a new Mega Cash Days winner is crowned and earns the $100,000.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Diesel Dave picks his first giveaway truck and dreams big, attempting to build the 2020 version of the Kodiak; Todd LeDuc challenges the guys to a desert race and flips the script by picking The Muscle to be on his team.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Diesel Dave continues working on his epic modern-day Kodiak while making sure he doesn't break the bank; Sam the Mad Scientist unveils The Kraken; a diesel-powered monowheel vehicle that is unlike anything the guys have ever seen.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Mad Scientist Sam's wild creation, the Kraken, comes to life, but Heavy D continues to be skeptical of the build's potential viral success; a high-profile client wants to customize a Ram 3500, which puts Diesel Dave and The Muscle to the test.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D surprises the mechanics with his build: a tank; he has big plans for the beast, but must first find a new engine and get it moving again; Heavy D, Diesel Dave and the Muscle personally trick out their latest giveaway truck.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers continue work on their tank build, but engine and transmission troubles put the project in jeopardy; the shop splits into teams for a build-off between an AMC Eagle and a Subaru Brat for the Tour de Utah off-road race.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers continue work on their rival builds for the first ever Tour de Utah off-road race; Heavy D pulls out all the stops for his AMC Eagle conversion while Diesel Dave and team smash together a Brat and an Impreza to avoid a full build.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers plan to gather 10 of the most iconic diesel vehicles ever built, give them a complete overhaul, and auction them off in one of the wildest diesel auctions ever.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D thinks he's found gold in a rare diesel Cadillac; Diesel Bi-Wheel is almost ready to roll, but the guys may need to pump the brakes.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D enlists a unique semi-amphibious off-road military vehicle that gives Redbeard a sinking feeling; time's up for the Diesel Bi-Wheel, and they're left questioning its big debut.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Redbeard goes rogue taking on an iconic diesel vehicle build of his own; it's time to see if the Gama Goat will sink or swim.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D thinks he's found gold in a rare diesel Cadillac; Diesel Bi-Wheel is almost ready to roll, but the guys may need to pump the brakes.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Heavy D enlists a unique semi-amphibious off-road military vehicle that gives Redbeard a sinking feeling; time's up for the Diesel Bi-Wheel, and they're left questioning its big debut.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Redbeard goes rogue taking on an iconic diesel vehicle build of his own; it's time to see if the Gama Goat will sink or swim.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers plan to gather 10 of the most iconic diesel vehicles ever built, give them a complete overhaul, and auction them off in one of the wildest diesel auctions ever.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers continue work on their tank build, but engine and transmission troubles put the project in jeopardy; the shop splits into teams for a build-off between an AMC Eagle and a Subaru Brat for the Tour de Utah off-road race.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers continue work on their rival builds for the first ever Tour de Utah off-road race; Heavy D pulls out all the stops for his AMC Eagle conversion while Diesel Dave and team smash together a Brat and an Impreza to avoid a full build.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: KevDogg and Dave take the rig to the Triple Crown of Rodding show in Nashville; this is one of the few shows they've attended in the South, and they are chomping at the bit to check out all of the local builders, and get into some shenanigans.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A week in the life of a shop like Kindig-It Design is a mix of beauty and chaos; a look at one week includes multiple stories of what actually happens behind the scenes of the show, along with all the projects underway that week.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Jimmie Caldwell dig into the Grand Trashional, the cheapest running turbo Buick ever. They swap in a much-preferred 1987 intercooler engine, and then bolt up a ton of modern performance parts in an attempt to get this thing making serious power.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to Moab, UT, for the April Action Car Show; he then makes his way to Allentown, PA.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Check-in on Sam and Doug and other teams during the Great Race from Saint Paul, Minnesota, to Irmo, South Carolina.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Building a Buick T-Type on a budget after a total dyno letdown, the crew finds the right transmission and torque converter to let it go head-to-head in a driving battle.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The Coyote-engine-swapped 2004 GT gets a chassis and suspension upgrade to handle the 400-plus horses the 2015 F-150 Coyote V-8 puts down; Tony Angelo and Jimmie Caldwell replace the rear four-link suspension with a Griggs Racing torque arm setup.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa are reunited with the Crown Hick, a 1966 F-100 sitting on an entire 2007 Crown Victoria frame, with suspension upgrades and a supercharger.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky stray way off the beaten path with a 1990 Plymouth Voyager five-speed, turbocharged minivan; the boys refresh the suspension, engine and accessories until this 250,000-mile van is as good as new.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Lucky and Tony upgrade a '66 Chevelle with a 475-hp NA LS engine, constructed with AFR heads and a rack-and-pinion conversion to make the drive even better.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian builds out monster axles to handle the kind of abuse only 40-inch tires can dish out; sparks fly as he cuts and clears the inner fender wells, making room for all that rubber and travel.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian transforms a Factory Five Racing XTF test mule into a hardcore support rig for the Build for Off Road Adventure Ride; he starts by breathing life into the engine and then it's all about strength and control.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian gets the FJ45 project off the fab table and shows you what engine he's installing on the vehicle. But there is plenty of work Ian needs to do before the project can finally sit on its own wheels and tires.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian puts one of his creations to the test on some of the most challenging rock trails and hill climbs in the Southeast, as he embarks on a multi-day road trip through Golden Mountain Off-Road Park and the Sand Mine Trail.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The Grand Trashional gets one more shot at making the power it deserves; Alex and Lucky put their faith in heads, a cam, hopes and a dream; because they're gluttons for punishment, they introduce another creampuff to the fleet, another GM turbo V6.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: HRG's Javelin is back to get seating sorted, safety started and the nut behind the wheel trained; after adding seats and a roll cage, Alex and Lucky strap in to battle the Javelin's hottest lap times.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Alex and Lucky bring in a pair of entry-level drift cars, two Nissan 370Zs. Drift-prepping the twin-Zs with basic upgrades, these once abused and beaten Zs will continue to be abused and beaten, except now under the watchful eye of an actual pro drifter.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: A little work gets you a little faster, but a lotta work gets you a LOT faster; Alex and Lucky bounce between the turbocharged five-speed Voyager minivan and the newest member of the HRG stable, a desert-fresh, soon-to-be-tube-chassised '55 Savoy.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The gang gets sick, loses the shop, and still manages to finish the Savoy. Not just finish it, but transform it from its shell of a self into a blown, injected, six-speed, tube-chassised, big-tire Savoy. It's a feat of endurance and a sight to behold.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Alex and Lucky prep the Crown Hic and DiesEl Camino for a burnout competition with the Roadkill and FWF guys; then it's down to business as Alex flexes her stick shift skills in the "Influencer Grudge Match" drag race at Roadkill Nights.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Fresh off their win at Roadkill Nights, Alex and Lucky take on double the cars for double the seat time; a Coyote-swapped 04 Mustang and a leaking but eager 74 Javelin track screamer are just barely on the list.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Like drag racing before it, roll racing is starting to get organized and move to the track; the team is just one Vortech V7 install away from trying this craze, pitting Lucky's soon-to-be 1,000-hp Chevelle against last season's 1,000-hp Caprice PPV.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The MythDuster's early Gen III Hemi has been resting in pieces ever since Engine Masters gave it a lackluster report card; Alex and Lucky upgrade the engine with much-improved heads to get the MythDuster making some actual power and passes.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Roadkill Garage's old project Tater Truck has been loafing around the offices for years, begging for some love; Alex and Lucky decide what to do with this sluggish, tired and granny-geared F-250.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Like drag racing before it, roll racing is starting to get organized and move to the track; the team is just one Vortech V7 install away from trying this craze, pitting Lucky's soon-to-be 1,000-hp Chevelle against last season's 1,000-hp Caprice PPV.

programme.desc: Fresh off their win at Roadkill Nights, Alex and Lucky take on double the cars for double the seat time; a Coyote-swapped 04 Mustang and a leaking but eager 74 Javelin track screamer are just barely on the list.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The gang gets sick, loses the shop, and still manages to finish the Savoy. Not just finish it, but transform it from its shell of a self into a blown, injected, six-speed, tube-chassised, big-tire Savoy. It's a feat of endurance and a sight to behold.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Alex and Lucky prep the Crown Hic and DiesEl Camino for a burnout competition with the Roadkill and FWF guys; then it's down to business as Alex flexes her stick shift skills in the "Influencer Grudge Match" drag race at Roadkill Nights.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A '55 Bel Air that sat unused for over 10 years arrives to get off the lift and back on the road; a unicorn project arrives in the form of a 2002 Ferrari 360 Spider in need of a new canvas top.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: From the outside, a '57 Bel-Air has all the markings of a classic, but a closer inspection reveals rust in the rockers, sloppy gaps and damaged trim; while fixing up the obvious, the customer also wants a bigger engine.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: A bi-annual auto festival at Panama City Beach, Fla., is known as the South's Best Blast from the Past.

programme.title: Motorhead Garage
programme.desc: If it goes, Dave Dobson and the Motorhead Garage crew are fans. They bring you their love for all things motorized as they modify cars, trucks, ATVs and motorcycles using aftermarket equipment, ranging from the tried-and-true to the innovative and new.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian builds out monster axles to handle the kind of abuse only 40-inch tires can dish out; sparks fly as he cuts and clears the inner fender wells, making room for all that rubber and travel.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks
programme.desc: Martha flips a gem from the prewar era; Ash's custom truck comes with some unpleasant revelations; Tommy acts like a rock star; JD transforms a 1966 Mustang.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: Willie B and Kevin Byrd rescue a classic Dodge D150, repairing rust, refreshing its look, and prepping the drivetrain, before dropping in a late-model carbureted Hemi with a Tremec transmission to build the ultimate budget-friendly tow rig.

programme.title: Two Guys Garage
programme.desc: The guys take the legendary '69 GTO Judge to the next level, diving into wiring, door panels, and interior sound deadening to add more modern comfort options and finish this muscle car's interior in style.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: It is Matt and Bruno's turn to do some upgrades on Willie B's CJ-7 that will be headed out to California; working on the gears and axles, as well as giving it a custom set of bead locks.

programme.title: Truck U
programme.desc: This Tacoma is owned by an active family that loves the outdoors. We get it set up to carry more gear and ride a whole lot better. Not only will it ride a lot better, but it will also sound a lot better when we are done with the new exhaust.

programme.title: Build for Off-Road
programme.desc: Ian transforms a Factory Five Racing XTF test mule into a hardcore support rig for the Build for Off Road Adventure Ride; he starts by breathing life into the engine and then it's all about strength and control.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks
programme.desc: A 2007 BMW Alpina B7 holds a secret for Ash; Tommy transforms a Toyota Land Cruiser; JD hopes to flip a Z28 for a quick profit; Martha scores a 1961 Chevy Corvair.

programme.title: Custom Carolina
programme.desc: In the south, it's all about family; two brothers ask Tommy to preserve and modernize their grandfather's 1955 Chevy pickup truck, so the team restores this vintage ride to its former glory.

programme.title: Custom Carolina
programme.desc: Tommy and his best friend take a ride back to the '80s; the shop crew transforms a bone-stock 1986 Monte Carlo SS into a LT4 "Monster Carlo" mega machine.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: NFL GameDay Live
programme.desc: Expanding on NFL Network's "GameDay" programming on Sundays during football season, "GameDay Live" updates viewers on what's happening throughout the league. Beginning with kickoff of early-afternoon events and continuing throughout late-afternoon contests, the studio show offers nearly immediate highlights of scoring and other notable plays. But the program is about more than the action; it intersperses highlights of press conferences, interviews with players and coaches, and live reports by announcers at game sites.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) is a charming playboy who doesn't believe in serious relationships. His best friends bet him that if he commits to one woman for one month, he's bound to fall in love. Charlie accepts the seemingly easy challenge, but wasn't expecting to cross paths with the beautiful and mysterious Eva (Cassie Ventura). When Charlie coaxes her into a casual affair, Eva turns the tables on him, forcing the lifelong bachelor to question whether he wants more than just a one-night stand.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Delivery man Leo Jackson (Donald Faison) is definitely on the wrong road to success. He still lives at home, he and his girlfriend just broke up, and he has multiple complaints stacked against him at work. Fortunately, Leo has plenty of marijuana to keep his mind off his troubles. But when he accidentally delivers a box of cocaine to the wrong address, Leo finds himself in the middle of a bad deal that may just cost him his life.

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: Landing in jail for a petty theft crime, Alvin finds himself sharing a cell with John Jaster, the incarcerated half of the pair of high-tech thieves responsible for the missing gold. His partner, Bristol, is still at large. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. Alvin has his freedom and the Feds have found their bait.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sparta's first black female cop is killed while on duty, and an angry Chief Gillespie assumes responsibility for tracking down her killer.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Released by his kidnappers, Chief Gillespie hunts for Dugan's killers while attempting to prevent the assassination of a civil rights leader.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Bubba (Alan Autry) becomes a target after fatally shooting a former Spartan during an attempted robbery. With Carroll O'Connor and Howard Rollins.

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: Once a first-rate Secret Service agent, Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) is now a gruff private investigator whose latest gig is protecting a pole dancer (Halle Berry). When she's murdered, he grudgingly teams up with her boyfriend, Jimmy Dix (Damon Wayans), an ex-quarterback with a gambling problem, and the two go after her killers. Before long, they stumble onto a plot by a well-known football magnate (Noble Willingham) to bribe federal legislators into legalizing sports gambling.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: Mick Haller (Matthew McConaughey) is a charismatic defense attorney who does business out of his Lincoln Continental sedan. Mick spends most of his time defending petty crooks and other bottom-feeders, so it comes as quite a surprise when he lands the case of a lifetime: defending a Beverly Hills playboy (Ryan Phillippe) who is accused of attempted murder. However, what Mick initially thinks is an open-and-shut case with a big monetary reward develops into something more sinister.

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: A former government operative renowned for his stealth, Jack Cole (Steven Seagal) is now a Los Angeles police detective. When a series of horrible murders occurs in the metro area, Cole is assigned to the case, along with tough-talking fellow cop Jim Campbell (Keenen Ivory Wayans). Although the two men clash, they gradually become effective partners as they uncover a conspiracy linked to the killings, which also involves terrorism and organized crime.

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian Detroit, grand houses that once housed the wealthy are now homes of the city's most-dangerous criminals. Surrounding the area is a giant wall to keep the rest of Detroit safe. For undercover cop Damien Collier (Paul Walker), every day is a battle against corruption as he struggles to bring his father's killer, Tremaine (RZA), to justice. Meanwhile, Damien and an ex-con named Lino (David Belle) work together to save the city from a plot to destroy it.

programme.title: Exit Wounds
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: Swordfish
programme.desc: Behind the world's most sophisticated security systems, billions of illegal government funds lie. Gabriel Shear plans to finance his own brand of ruthless patriotism if he can break into this virtual Fort Knox. He needs parolee Stanley Jobson, the only man capable of penetrating the layers of firewalls and encrypted passwords. Now Shear and his partner Ginger use every lure, including the promise to reunite Jobson with his daughter, to obtain the greatest computer hack ever.

programme.title: One-Day International Cricket

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: It's the hottest day of the year and when Italian-American Sal refuses to make changes to his pizza parlour in the predominantly black community, tension and tempers mount.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher, life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth, and has a loving daughter. However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embarks on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A soldier returns from Vietnam to find his boyhood friend, also a fellow soldier, in a military hospital, having suffered a mental breakdown in which he has become detached from reality and imagines that he is a bird.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the network's money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the city's subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: Hondo Lane offers to keep an abandoned mother-son duo safe during an Apache attack. Along the way, he forms a strong bond with them. What challenges await them? Will they manage to survive?

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hair's-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone' in the first `Superman' movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helplessly.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kent's class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a small frontier town in the American southwest, provoked into a gunfight in which he kills three men, and then begged by the townsfolk to become sheriff. The residents are terrified of the gunslinger but live in greater fear of a gang which intends to wipe out the whole town.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthor's nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. programme.title: Superman III

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
