Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owner's kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but she's smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested if she wasn't so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. There's trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red' Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieri's Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozart's progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man he's never met.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the president's bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the president's bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm

In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: A true story of two remaining officers desperately trying to rally their meagre force of 105 men against 4,000 attacking Zulu warriors. Cetewayo, ruler of the Zulu kingdom, begins his war against the white invaders with the annihilation of the British army at Isandhlwana and moves on to his next target - the depleted garrison at Rorke's Drift.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austria's crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of London's East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A drought-devastated farmer is desperate for money and, for $200, agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train comes to take him to jail. However, the farmer has not reckoned on his prisoner's psychological wiles and must resist manipulative strategies aimed at permitting him to escape.

However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielberg's 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

Ned is also suspicious of how the knight came to be matched up against Ser Gregor Clegane, known as The Mountain, in the tourney.

programme.title: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The Capaccios strike out at Sangue Blu as they set out to conquer Forcella. Meanwhile, an isolated Enzo risks not only losing his turf, but also his men's loyalty.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Having realised the cause of all of her misfortunes, Patrizia is forced to face up to a life-changing decision.

programme.title: The Sopranos

Intrigued by Fran, Tony starts spending time with her. In a session with Dr Melfi, Tony reveals that when he was a teenager he once lied to his mother, who was hospitalised following a miscarriage, regarding his father's whereabouts.

Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Judi Love's Culinary Cruise
programme.desc: The presenter stops at the archaeological site of Delphi in Greece, where she visits its famous ruins, meets the inhabitants of a bee farm, and tastes their honey. programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Royal Kitchen Gardens

programme.title: James Martin's Great British Adventure

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh

programme.title: Champions: Full Gallop
programme.desc: It is Boxing Day at Kempton and the stage is set for a Christmas showdown like no other. programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Coverage of today's race meetings.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: Live International Football
programme.desc: England Women v Brazil Women (Kick-off 5.30pm). Seema Jaswal is joined by Ian Wright and Anita Asante to present coverage of the international friendly at Etihad Stadium in Manchester. These nations last met in the 2023 Women's Finalissima at Wembley, where England, the European Champions, defeated the South American Champions on penalties after the game ended in a 1-1 draw. Two years later, both teams once again hold their respective continental titles, with England having won the UEFA Women's Championship twice and Brazil now the nine-time champions of the Copa América Femenina. With commentary by Seb Hutchinson and Lucy Ward, and reports from Katie Shanahan.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Compilation of some of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, in which the last contestant standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Quiz game show hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts, but are all about logic and common sense. A hundred contestants begin every show, but who will make it to the end and answer a question only one per cent of the country can get right - and win up to £100,000?

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan's Parents' Evening
programme.desc: Tom Allen and his mum Irene, Fleur East and her mum Irene, and Steve Pemberton and his daughter Maddie compete in the comedy game show. The parents choose which questions their children will answer and gamble on how many they can get right. If the contestants meet expectations they will get the money, but fall short and the cash is split between the other teams.

programme.title: The Jonathan Ross Show: Special Guests
programme.desc: A look back at more of the most memorable moments from recent series, including interviews with Alicia Keys, Steve Carell, Stormzy, Emma Thompson, Stephen Graham, Jack Whitehall, Carrie Fisher, Elvis Costello, Freddie Flintoff and Katherine Jenkins.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the latest matches, including Ipswich Town v West Bromwich Albion at Portman Road, Bristol City v Birmingham City at Ashton Gate, and Millwall v Leicester City at The Den, in the Championship.

programme.title: Frauds
programme.desc: It is the day of the heist, but with tensions high and bitter resentment and revenge in the air, Sam and Bert have to keep it together long enough to pull their plan off and escape each other for ever? The conclusion of the crime drama set in Andalusia, starring Jodie Whittaker and Suranne Jones.

programme.title: Night Vision

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Royal Kitchen Gardens
programme.desc: The chef visits Castle of Mey in Caithness, where gardener Chris tells him about what it takes to grow produce in the blustery grounds.

programme.title: James Martin's Spanish Adventure
programme.desc: The TV chef embarks on a culinary journey through Spain, discovering the history and culture of the country's diverse regions through food. He starts out in San Sebastian, where he tries whole grilled turbot, samples local cider and shops at the fish market. Along the way he cooks hake, lamb, Basque stew and pintxos.

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is joined by Professor T star Ben Miller, there are dishes from chefs Lisa Goodwin-Allen and Sami Tamimi, and he also chas to gardener David Domoney in his vegetable patch.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm are actress Amanda Redman and farmers Kelvin and Liz Fletcher, while there is an update on guide dog in training Titch. Horticulturalist Camilla Bassett-Smith has Halloween on her mind with her eerie planters and there is a gin masterclass from Andy Clarke.

programme.title: Fletchers' Family Farm
programme.desc: Birds and bugs need to be kept at bay to protect their first crop of oats, so the children get creative making scarecrows. Liz comes up with a plan to get their unruly chickens in check, and Kelvin calls a vet to help a ewe struggling to feed her twin lambs.

programme.title: Talking Royals
programme.desc: The weekly round-up of royal news, with expert analysis from ITV News' royal editor Chris Ship and expert Lizzie Robinson, and guests.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: STV Racing Live: Aintree
programme.desc: Coverage of today's race meetings.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The young wizard is given the task of uncovering the secrets of Lord Voldemort's past as the evil sorcerer's henchmen cause havoc in both the magical and Muggle worlds. With the help of headmaster Dumbledore, Harry ventures into the memories of those who knew the Dark Lord during his early years, hoping to gain an insight into the secret behind his apparent immortality. However, Voldemort's influence extends much closer to home than expected, as Harry's rival Malfoy is chosen to carry out a sinister mission. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Michael Gambon, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Tom Felton and Alan Rickman.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: Another line-up of contestants answer questions that could change their lives - with lifelines, including Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend and 50-50 available to them if they get stuck. Hosted by Jeremy Clarkson.

programme.title: Beat the Chasers - Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen, Shobna Gulati, David James and Will Bayley take on quiz experts Mark Labbett, Anne Hegerty, Shaun Wallace, Paul Sinha, Jenny Ryan and Darragh Ennis, hoping to win big money for their chosen charities.

programme.title: Trigger Point
programme.desc: Explosives officer Lana Washington and her team are called to investigate a suspected bomb in a black cab that has been abandoned on waste ground, but they soon realise they're at the site of something far more sinister. Working alongside their colleagues in counter-terrorism, the team races to find out what the person behind this unique bombing campaign wants, who they are and who they might be targeting next. Thriller, starring Vicky McClure.

programme.title: ITV News and Weather

programme.title: State of War: Fighting the Narcos
programme.desc: A look at Ecuador's fight against drug cartels and street gangs through the stories of three people whose lives are bound by tragedy and conviction. There is a priest who believes that violence cannot be fought with more violence, a state governor embodying the government belief that only overwhelming force can restore order, and a man seeking justice for his son, who was allegedly killed by the military.

programme.title: Heathrow: Britain's Busiest Airport
programme.desc: Terminal 3 re-opens its doors to the public 15 months into the global pandemic, with 11 Virgin flights set to take off, but teething problems threaten to delay one of the departures. It's business as usual in Terminal 5 as Passenger Experience Manager Tas is called to deal with an arriving passenger who is refusing to pay for his mandatory Covid tests, while the City of London Corporation's Animal Reception Centre have quarantined two dogs who have flown into the USA without proof of treatment for tapeworm.

programme.title: Bonjour ! La Matinale TF1
programme.desc: E470 "Bonjour ! La Matinale TF1" est le premier rendez-vous de la journée à l'antenne de TF1 du lundi au vendredi de 6h55 à 10h00, présenté par Bruce Toussaint et sa bande chroniqueurs.

programme.title: Les Feux de l'amour
programme.desc: Dans le petit monde de Genoa City, les rivalités entre familles influentes vont bon train et se transmettent de génération en génération. Alliances et trahisons, amour et haine, argent et pouvoir, les enjeux sont de taille et les clans Newman, Abbott, Foster et Chancellor n'en finissent plus de se déchirer, parfois au péril de certaines vies.

programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre
programme.desc: Laurent Mariotte donne toutes les astuces pour préparer de bons petits plats, comme un vrai chef, avec des ingrédients frais et de saison.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: Chaque jour, des candidats tentent de répondre à des questions ludiques et culturelles afin de gagner jusqu'à 30 000 euros. Mais ils devront avoir décroché la mystérieuse étoile aux cadeaux avant que ne retentissent Les 12 coups de midi.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: E61 Chaque jour, quatre candidats s'affrontent pour empocher les 30 000 euros de la cagnotte et décrocher l'étoile mystérieuse et ses cadeaux. Seule condition, bien répondre aux questions de culture générale posées par Jean-Luc Reichmann.

programme.title: Météo
programme.desc: Prévisions météorologiques en France par le service de TF1.

programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Une résidente est atteinte d'un mal mystérieux, provoquant rumeurs et superstitions. L'intervention de Zoé la place dans une situation délicate. Pendant ce temps, Baptiste s'inquiète au Mistral, après avoir reçu un appel à l'aide alarmant..

programme.title: Noël au coin du feu
programme.desc: A l'approche de Noël, Rose, une Américaine qui vit de spéculation immobilière, achète un petit cottage à Dunclare, sur la côte irlandaise. A son arrivée, Rose a rendez-vous avec Sean, l'agent immobilier qui lui a vendu la maison. Sa relation avec ce dernier prend petit à petit une autre tournure..

programme.title: Noël au coin du feu
programme.desc: Alors qu'elle vient d'acheter une maison sur la côte irlandaise, une jeune Américaine voit sa relation avec l'agent immobilier prendre une tournure inattendue.

programme.title: Un Noël so British
programme.desc: Anji est personal shopper à Londres et durant la période de Noël, elle est particulièrement active. En courant les magasins, elle rencontre David, un Américain installé depuis peu dans la capitale anglaise et qui vient d'acheter une carte cadeau pour sa petite amie, Charlotte..

programme.title: Un Noël so British
programme.desc: A Noël, une personal shopper londonienne rencontre un Américain installé depuis peu dans la capitale et qui vient d'acheter une carte cadeau pour sa petite amie.

C'est désormais l'heure de la finale pour eux. Les enquêteurs utilisent tous les moyens à leur disposition pour tenter de démasquer les trois dernières célébrités et conclure cette huitième saison.

programme.title: Reportages découverte
programme.desc: Pour découvrir les secrets ou la face cachée de Marseille, une équipe a arpenté la ville de nuit et durant plusieurs mois et elle a découvert des lieux festifs, joyeux, à l'avant-garde de nombreuses modes. En suivant les pas d'un kinésithérapeute qui devient drag queen, d'explorateurs urbains, d'une chauffeur de taxi privé ou des marins pompiers, un plongeon est fait dans les coulisses de la cité phocéenne.

programme.title: Reportages découverte
programme.desc: Balades nocturnes : les mystères de Marseille Pour découvrir les secrets ou la face cachée de Marseille, une équipe a arpenté la ville de nuit et durant plusieurs mois et elle a découvert des lieux festifs, joyeux, à l'avant-garde de nombreuses modes. En suivant les pas d'un kinésithérapeute qui devient drag queen, d'explorateurs urbains, d'une "chauffeur de taxi privé" ou des marins pompiers, un plongeon est fait dans les coulisses de la cité phocéenne.

programme.title: Reportages découverte
programme.desc: Une équipe a suivi Fabian et sa femme Estelle, un couple qui ne voyage qu'en train, avec ses trois filles âgées de 9, 7 et 2 ans, à la découverte de la Laponie. Zoom également sur Nadine, Fabienne, sa fille Léonora, et Cécile, la copine de Léonora, engagées dans un grand périple ferroviaire en Inde.

programme.title: Les Docs du week-end
programme.desc: Que sont devenues les figures marquantes des émissions de la téléréalité ? Quelle est la nouvelle vie de Giuseppe, le provoquant macho de Qui veut épouser mon fils ?, du beau Senna, qui a fait chavirer plus d'un coeur dans Secret Story, de Beverly Bello, l'inoubliable figure de La Villa des coeurs brisés, ou encore d'Alicia Mahé, en quête d'un mari dans Mariés au premier regard ? Tous ont accepté d'ouvrir leur porte pour raconter leur quotidien, loin du showbiz et des années paillettes.

programme.title: Les Docs du week-end

programme.title: 50mn Inside l'actu
programme.desc: L'actu 50' Inside, c'est toute l'actualité des stars résumée, chaque samedi. Le rendez-vous glamour pour retrouver toujours plus de news, d'interviews, d'actualité people en France et à l'étranger, de destinations de rêve et de reportages exclusifs au bout du monde pour partir à la rencontre de vos personnalités préférées et vous faire découvrir leurs repaires secrets.

programme.desc: Les derniers résultats des Loto. programme.title: Star Academy
programme.desc: Les talentueux chanteurs en herbe qui ont décroché leur place au château de Dammarie-les-Lys ont tous les yeux rivés vers un seul et même objectif : succéder à Marine, la gagnante de la précédente édition. Pour réaliser ce rêve, ils doivent suivre scrupuleusement les conseils distillés par les enseignants.

programme.title: Star Academy
programme.desc: S13 E2 Les talentueux chanteurs en herbe qui ont décroché leur place au château de Dammarie-les-Lys ont tous les yeux rivés vers un seul et même objectif : succéder à Marine, la gagnante de la précédente édition. Pour réaliser ce rêve, ils doivent suivre scrupuleusement les conseils distillés par les enseignants.

programme.title: Star Academy
programme.desc: Ils ont entre 18 et 24 ans, ce sont de jeunes artistes en devenir, qui ont obtenu leur place pour rejoindre le légendaire château de Dammarie-les-Lys. Leur point commun ? Un talent artistique qu'ils vont perfectionner au fil de l'aventure. Les défis sont nombreux, et ils doivent, chaque semaine, donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes pour espérer rester en lice et atteindre la finale.

programme.title: Star Academy
programme.desc: S13 E2 Ils ont entre 18 et 24 ans, ce sont de jeunes artistes en devenir, qui ont obtenu leur place pour rejoindre le légendaire château de Dammarie-les-Lys. Leur point commun ? Un talent artistique qu'ils vont perfectionner au fil de l'aventure. Les défis sont nombreux, et ils doivent, chaque semaine, donner le meilleur d'eux-mêmes pour espérer rester en lice et atteindre la finale.

programme.title: Star Academy, retour au château
programme.desc: Karima Charni raccompagne les élèves au château et revient avec eux sur le prime du soir. Deux de leurs camarades ont quitté l'aventure, et c'est toujours un déchirement de repartir sans la présence de ces personnes. Mais c'est la dure réalité, et même si leur amitié est importante, ils gardent tous en tête leur objectif final.

programme.title: Star Academy, retour au château
programme.desc: S13 E2 Karima Charni raccompagne les élèves au château et revient avec eux sur le prime du soir. Deux de leurs camarades ont quitté l'aventure, et c'est toujours un déchirement de repartir sans la présence de ces personnes. Mais c'est la dure réalité, et même si leur amitié est importante, ils gardent tous en tête leur objectif final.

programme.title: Programmes de la nuit
programme.desc: Passage à l'heure d'hiver, à 3 heures du matin, il sera 2 heures.

programme.title: TFou
programme.desc: Une émission jeunesse qui propose les meilleures séries de dessins animés du moment.

programme.title: Automoto
programme.desc: Nouveau logo, nouveau décor, nouvel habillage et nouvelle pilote : Automoto fait peau neuve en cette nouvelle saison. L'émission propose une large diversité de sujets et de reportages : nouvelle rubrique pratique, essais, comparatifs, sports mécaniques, vintage, l'objectif est de réunir et d'expliquer les thématiques automobiles et motos au plus grand nombre.

programme.title: Grands reportages
programme.desc: Ce nouvel épisode retrace les joies et les déboires de plusieurs familles qui se sont lancées dans l'aventure de la propriété. En Bourgogne, Vanessa et Vincent travaillent d'arrache pied pour transformer un château en chambres d'hôtes. Dans le Sud-Ouest, un jeune couple originaire du Québec, effectue ses premières vendanges, tout en se préparant à accueillir leur premier enfant.

programme.title: Reportages découverte
programme.desc: La France compte plus de 17 000 hôtels. Beaucoup appartiennent à des chaînes hôtelières et à des grands groupes. Mais chaque année, des hôteliers se lancent dans le projet d'une vie : créer un hôtel pas comme les autres. Pendant plus d'un an, une équipe a suivi d'audacieux passionnés qui s'investissent corps et âme dans leur établissement.

programme.title: Star Academy, la quotidienne
programme.desc: Retour sur les moments forts de la journée des candidats de Star Academy avec un débrief de leurs prestations, des cours et des moments de vie.

programme.title: Sept à huit
programme.desc: Des reportages sur la société et l'actualité nationale et internationale, des zooms sur des faits divers ou des gros plans sur des événements marquants du moment invitent à découvrir le monde d'aujourd'hui. Le portrait de la semaine clôt le rendez-vous.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Les Etats-Unis fêtent leur indépendance lorsque les stations-radar du monde entier s'affolent. Une masse non identifiée s'approche de la Terre. Le soir même, toutes les métropoles sont rayées de la carte du monde. Le président Whitmore et quelques rescapés parviennent à s'enfuir dans une base secrète..

programme.title: Ant-Man et la Guêpe : Quantumania
programme.desc: Désormais libérée, Janet Van Dyne coule des jours heureux auprès de Hank, son compagnon, et de sa fille Hope, tout comme Scott Lang qui a repris une vie normale après ses récentes aventures. Pourtant, Hope continue de mener des recherches sur la dimension subatomique, au grand dam de sa mère..

programme.title: Mon cher père Noël
programme.desc: Lorsqu'elle était enfant, Olivia a écrit une lettre au Père Noël lui demandant de lui révéler le nom de l'amour de sa vie. Des années plus tard, Olivia s'apprête à présenter sa première émission quand une réponse lui parvient. Son grand amour s'appelle Nick, et il faudra lui avouer sa flamme avant Noël. Malheureusement, Olivia a plus d'un Nick dans sa vie, et le choix est bien plus compliqué qu'elle ne l'aurait pensé.. programme.title: Mon cher père Noël
programme.desc: Une réponse - tardive - du Père Noël révèle à une jeune présentatrice l'identité de son grand amour, mais dans son entourage, plusieurs personnes portent ce prénom.

programme.title: Un souhait magique pour Noël
programme.desc: Renée, qui rêve de vendre des paniers-repas de qualité, se morfond dans la maison de banlieue de sa mère décédée, accompagnée de son mari, Aaron, qui lui, rêve de devenir chef cuisinier à New York et d'y fonder une famille. Lorsqu'un elfe du Père Noël offre à Renée une clochette lui permettant d'exaucer un voeu, cette dernière souhaite vivre une autre vie. Elle se réveille alors dans un bureau en plein coeur de New York, P.-D. G. d'une entreprise à succès de livraison de paniers-repas qui porte le nom de sa mère, bien vivante. Mais Renée découvre bientôt que dans cette nouvelle vie, Aaron et elle sont séparés. Tout en essayant de s'adapter à ses fonctions de cheffe d'entreprise, elle va tout mettre en oeuvre pour récupérer son mari.. Tandis que l'hôpital déclenche le Plan Blanc, les écoles sont évacuées. Dans le chaos qui s'ensuit, les personnalités des uns et des autres s'expriment de manière exacerbée. Une saison 9 marquée notamment par le départ de Romane Parc dans le rôle de Lilou Clavel et Patrick Seminor dans celui de Joël Tundis Les Julliard font une découverte qui pourrait changer leur vie. Océane confie Romain à Noor. programme.title: Montmartre
programme.desc: Années 1900, à Paris. Déterminée à retrouver la trace de son frère et de sa soeur dont elle a été séparée suite à la mort de leur père, Céleste finance les recherches en dansant nue dans un cabaret de Montmartre. Parallèlement, Arsène, ingénieur issu d'une famille aisée, refuse de se plier à la volonté de son père, un homme autoritaire qui souhaite contrôler sa vie. Blanchisseuse, Rose voit quant à elle son existence tourner au drame lorsqu'elle se retrouve prisonnière d'une maison close à l'aube de son mariage. Tous trois vont découvrir les liens qui les unissent après avoir été réunis par le destin. Des thèmes universels tels que l'amour, la famille ou l'identité rythment ce drame historique porté par Alice Dufour Céleste et Léon sont en désaccord, leur couple naissant se fragilise. Rose, pour sa part, ne sent pas en confiance avec la Comtesse et décide de quitter le château. De son côté, Arsène découvre d'énormes dettes dans l'héritage de son père et décide de renouer avec son frère

programme.title: Montmartre

Au même moment, Rose s'introduit au château de la Comtesse pour sauver Gustave, risquant tout dans une opération clandestine. Arsène cherche quant à lui une solution pour vivre son histoire d'amour interdite..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Le producteur primé de " New York, unité spéciale ", Dick Wolf, présente la 18e saison de la série. Mariska Hargitay revient dans le rôle de la lieutenante Olivia Benson, qui lui a valu huit nominations de meilleure actrice principale dans une série dramatique aux Emmy® et un Emmy Award® en 2006. Commandant par intérim de l'Unité spéciale à la police de New York, l'inspecteur Benson dirige une équipe d'inspecteurs cherchant à livrer les criminels sexuels violents à la justice Justin Collett, jeune new-yorkais aux excellents résultats scolaires, cherche à entrer dans une grande université américaine. Tandis qu'il s'est absenté avec son père à Boston, sa mère, Laura, retrouve un homme dans un hôtel. Puis elle attente à ses jours. L'unité, dépêchée sur les lieux, découvre que Laura a envoyé deux SMS différents vers un portable inconnu : dans le premier, elle disait à son interlocuteur qu'il avait été un amant exceptionnel, mais 10 minutes plus tard, son second texto l'accusait de l'avoir

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: L'unité spéciale surveille un salon de massage de Chinatown, soupçonné d'abriter des jeunes femmes sans-papiers. Elles seraient contraintes d'accomplir des services sexuels pour rembourser la dette contractée par leur famille auprès des passeurs qui les ont fait entrer illégalement aux Etats-Unis. Les policiers se font passer pour des clients et lors d'une descente, ils interpellent la patronne..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Le producteur primé de " New York, unité spéciale ", Dick Wolf, présente la 18e saison de la série. Mariska Hargitay revient dans le rôle de la lieutenante Olivia Benson, qui lui a valu huit nominations de meilleure actrice principale dans une série dramatique aux Emmy® et un Emmy Award® en 2006. Commandant par intérim de l'Unité spéciale à la police de New York, l'inspecteur Benson dirige une équipe d'inspecteurs cherchant à livrer les criminels sexuels violents à la justice Une athlète veut porter plainte pour viol à la police, mais craint que cela ne nuise à sa carrière olympique. Les inspecteurs l'écoutent mais découvrent rapidement des signes inquiétants d'une possible maladie mentale. Pendant ce temps, la soeur de Rollins est libérée de prison... programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: L'équipe enquête dans un hôtel, où femme mariée, mère de famille, a tenté de se suicider. Selon les premiers éléments, le directeur des admissions de l'université Hudson serait l'auteur de cette agression. Mais en allant interroger leur suspect, les enquêteurs font une bien étrange découverte..

programme.title: New York Unité Spéciale
programme.desc: Des changements affectent l'unité spéciale : tandis que Carisi devient le nouvel assistant du procureur, Benson a été promue capitaine par Dodds, lui-même transféré dans une unité d'intervention de Staten Island. Christian Garland intègre l'équipe et fait bonne impression auprès de ses nouveaux collègues dès sa première affaire à leurs côtés. Une psychologue enseigne une nouvelle technique d'interrogatoire aux inspecteurs. Avec cette 21e saison, la série devient la plus longue jamais diffusée en prime time : une belle longévité Les enquêteurs doivent redoubler d'efforts pour tenter de résoudre trois affaires de viol en même temps, en pleine nuit. L'équipe est stressée par cette lourde charge de travail. Tamin a du mal à se concentrer, alors que Rollins s'en prend à Carisi et lui fait des reproches... En replay Jean de Segonzac - Réalisateur Norberto Barba - Réalisateur Michael Smith - Réalisateur Leslie Hope - Réalisateur Martha Mitchell - Réalisateur Laurie Collyer - Réalisateur Timot

programme.title: Trois frères, Noël et un garçon
programme.desc: Cinq ans se sont écoulés depuis que les frères Brenner ont recueilli Thomas. Luke est investi dans son rôle de père, Taylor crée toujours des jeux vidéo et Stephan vient de publier un livre sur le développement personnel. Quand Sophie, la mère de Thomas, part en voyage d'affaires, les trois frères décident de s'occuper ensemble du petit. Ils provoquent malgré eux des catastrophes, dont la démission du professeur de musique. Ils vont devoir reprendre le spectacle de Noël en main et trouver des solutions à la dernière minute. Roy, le nouveau compagnon de leur mère, propose de les aider, mais les garçons ont du mal à accepter la présence d'un autre homme dans leur vie.. programme.title: Trois frères, Noël et un couffin
programme.desc: Une nuit, Luke découvre qu'un bébé, prénommé Thomas, a été déposé dans la caserne de pompier dans laquelle il travaille. La mère de l'enfant a laissé un mot, promettant d'être revenue pour Noël. Il décide donc de ramener le bébé chez lui, où il vit avec sa mère et ses deux frères. Tous les trois ont été abandonnés par leur père, ce qui a eu pour conséquence de les éloigner. Leur mère devant s'absenter pendant quelques jours, c'est à la fratrie de s'occuper du bébé, mais ils sont complètement perdus. Pourtant, ils vont devoir se surpasser pour que Thomas ne manque de rien durant ce séjour improvisé.. Terry Ingram - Réalisateur Paul Campbell - Stephan Tyler Hynes - Taylor Andrew W. programme.title: Harry Potter et la chambre des secrets
programme.desc: Un soir, l'oncle Vernon, la tante Pétunia et Dudley, le cousin d'Harry Potter, accueillent des invités importants, contraignant Harry à garder la chambre. C'est alors que Dobby, un elfe, fait son apparition. Il annonce à Harry que des menaces pèsent sur l'école de Poudlard. Le garçonnet refuse bien évidemment de croire ce petit être, et surtout de suivre son conseil : ne pas retourner en classe là-bas. Faisant fi de ces considérations, Harry fait sa rentrée des classes à Poudlard. Dès les premiers jours, une voix malveillante le prévient que la légendaire et redoutable Chambre des secrets est désormais à nouveau ouverte. Bientôt, les événements étranges se succèdent à Poudlard.. programme.title: Harry Potter et la chambre des secrets
programme.desc: Lors d'une soirée qu'il est contraint de passer dans sa chambre, le jeune Harry Potter voit apparaître Dobby, un elfe, qui lui annonce que des dangers menacent l'école de Poudlard, l'établissement qu'il fréquente. Et en effet, depuis la rentrée des classes, des événements étranges se succèdent...

programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: Après avoir plongé dans les secrets du monde primitif, les Harris se lancent dans une véritable course contre la montre pour retrouver Eve. Les enjeux sont plus élevés que jamais. Alors qu'ils affrontent les créatures préhistoriques les plus dangereuses, ils tentent de se réunir et de retrouver le monde qu'ils ont connu. Des effets spéciaux spectaculaires au service d'un scénario soigné, qui ménage quelques coups de théâtre efficaces Un gigantesque incendie force tout le monde à fuir le village. En 2021, Gavin est kidnappé par une femme en lien avec son passé et qui pourrait détenir les réponses qu'il cherchait pour retrouver Eve... programme.title: La Brea

programme.title: Tirage de l'EuroMillions
programme.desc: Consultez les derniers résultats d'EuroMillions ainsi que les codes gagnants My Million. Tous les mardi et vendredi, Elsa fayer ou Karine Ferri vous présentent les résultats des tirages officiels de My Million vers 20h50 puis EuroMillions vers 21h50. Découvrez les 5 numéros gagnants et les 2 bonnes étoiles d'EuroMillions mais aussi les codes gagnants My Million des derniers tirages !

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and the troubled Villiers family get together nine years after the death of eldest son Ferdy, a magician. A riddle in a cracker predicts that two people will die before midnight on Boxing Day, then the frail Lydia Villiers is hospitalised after a fall. As Barnaby abandons his Christmas lunch with the in-laws to investigate, it seems as though ghosts from the past are haunting the household.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones investigate when the appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths among an aristocratic family called the DeQuettevilles. Meanwhile, the family stage a Civil War re-enactment with their hostile neighbours and relive historic battles. Can the detectives uncover the truth about the DeQuettevilles and the ghostly rider in order to prevent more murders?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When convicted murderer Grady Felton returns to the village where he killed a boy years earlier, his arrival is met with anger from the locals. Soon afterwards, a barrister is killed in Midsomer and suspicion falls on Grady. Grady has a solid alibi, but Barnaby suspects that he is working with an accomplice - until Grady himself is targeted in an arson attack.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of a journalist has chilling echoes of a 1960s horror film starring Midsomer's own Stella Harris. When Stella's more famous sister returns after a 40-year family rift, the killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot, is life - and death - imitating art?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, amateur astronomer Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite. Barnaby and Jones soon discover intrigue, sexual tension and academic rivalry are rife among the star-seeking community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harriet Farmer wakes up after being in a coma since the night she tried to elope. Harriet's boyfriend Finn Robson has been missing since the couple tried to run away together a year before. Then the president of the local chess society, Edward Stannington, is found dead in a lake with an ice pick in his back. His damaged car is nearby and Kate finds a clue in his mouth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a woman is crushed to death by a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous `Midsomer Blue' Barnaby and Jones are soon on the case. Debbie Moffett worked at the dairy, founded by her colleague Jim Caxton, who seems more anxious about his precious cheese than Debbie's death and later, Debbie's lover Oliver Ordish is garrotted with cheese wire and covered with cheese fly larvae.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of arrogant local beauty Melissa Townsend is discovered by the pool at her manor house, DCI Barnaby uncovers a seedy world of adultery and deceit within the affluent rural community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby investigates the murders of bell ringers from the village church who are being mysteriously murdered one by one. Barnaby and Troy find that they must solve a riddle from the past before the killer strikes again.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby uncovers an elite Mafia-like sect called the Pudding Club at private boys' school Devington College while investigating a murder, and must get to the bottom of the mystery before another victim turns up dead.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the leader of a reading club used as a cover to run an investment portfolio is found battered to death, the club's secret activities are exposed and long-held secrets and desires return to haunt its members.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Susan Bartlett's body is discovered in a wood, villagers assume she killed herself because she could not have children. However, when it comes to light that her suicide note - in the form of an email - was sent too late, Barnaby soon finds himself in the midst of witchcraft, ancient potions, infidelity and land feuds.

programme.desc: When Scratch and Grounder use Robotnik's new Slo-Mo Ray Gun to capture Sonic, Tails rescues him by reversing the gun and turning it on a tribe of friendly Tree Sloth People who become a high speed commando strike force against Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik timetravels back to Mobigypt, makes himself a pharoah, and enslaves everbody in an effort to find the gemstone of immortality.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik installs a new "obedience microchip" in Scratch and Grounder and orders them to drill for a rare mineral in a tropical mountain. With his Freezomatic machine, Robotnik covers the mountain in ice and runs a Hermit out of his home.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Antoine saves Sally's life during a raid, Sonic can't stand his bragging and zips in to see Uncle Chuck, who finds out his "bug" in Robotnik's HQ is malfunctioning.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic is hired into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a "race to determine the fastest on Mobius".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface, when he sends explosive, Robotnik snake probes drilling deep under ground in search of oil lakes.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a roboti-sized "Sally" clone, complete with Sally's personality, and mannerisms. The double tricks Sonic into rescuing "Sally".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic attempts a solo rescue to prevent prisoners from being roboti-sized and is hit by a Memory Scrambler that erases short-term memory.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Freedom Fighters run into a Swashbuckler, named Ari, battling Swat-Bots. Sonic diverts them, allowing Ari to escape. After hearing that Robotnik is holding his band of Freedom Fighters hostage, Ari decides to help Sonic free them.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Dulcy exhibits strange behavior, Sally discovers she's going through a "rites of passage" stage of her adolescence. In Dragon tradition, she is drawn to Dragon Lair, a migratory nesting ground, through trance-like visits from her mother.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: On a mission to contact the first Freedom Fighters on the King's List, Sonic and the others are forced to travel through a tunnel which carries a "curse" against all intruders.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: As Sonic begins to chow chili dogs for a snack, he finds a message in the sack from his mother urging him to head to Speedster Island.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A captain of the Queen's guard is captured before he can reach the secret rendezvous where he was to meet Queen Aleena.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a robot coach -- the "Coachnik", to put S and G through a "Training Camp" to improve their skills. Then Coachnik puts a bomb in Grounder's head as a booby trap for Sonic, and a football game ensues with Grounder's head as the ball.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Professor Von Schlemmer (from Too Tall Tails) has created a machine which brings dreams to life. When Robotnik hears about it, he forces the Professor to alter the machine so that nightmares come to life.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Outraged by a new hit song written about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius then takes pop star, Catty Carlisle captive. With his MD (Music Destroyer) Robot, Robotnik terrorizes the music loving Mobius population till Sonic rescues Catty.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic loses his memory when Robotnik uses a hypnotic flower pollen on him, and tells him he's just an "ordinary" guy.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a giant AMNESIA RAY in his booby-trapped PINBALL FORTRESS (based on the Sonic game per Roger Hector) in order to erase the bad memories the Mobius citizens have of him, and make them think he's a great guy.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Wes Weasley lures Tails, Sonic and all of their friends to a yacht under the guise of a "Hero of the Year" ceremony to thank Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents an electron altering generator which makes Scratch and Grounder twice as fast as Sonic. When they lose it and Tails picks it up, Tails speeds through the Mobius countryside leaving disasters and accidents in his wake.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Robotnik puts a meteor on a collision course with a village, Sonic is forced to compete in the Robolympics to save the village. After a series of wild, booby trapped events, Sonic is victorious.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When outlaws chase a sheriff out of a western town, Sonic takes over. But the outlaws are robots built by Robotnik. And when they capture a pretty possum of a saloon girl, Sonic meets Robotnik for a showdown.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: San Antonio
programme.desc: Rancher Clay Hardin (Errol Flynn) has discovered that local saloon owner Roy Stuart (Paul Kelly) is selling cattle that doesn't belong to him, including some of Clay's own stolen stock. Armed with a tally book that proves it, Hardin now finds himself the target of Stuart's posse of gunslingers, who will stop at nothing to prevent Hardin from delivering the evidence to the proper authorities. With no one to help him except a few of his friends, Hardin has to fight for his cattle, and his life.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: A woman reports on corrupt officers.

programme.title: Fort Apache
programme.desc: When arrogant and stubborn Civil War hero Lieutenant Colonel Owen Thursday (Henry Fonda) arrives in Arizona with his daughter, Philadelphia (Shirley Temple), to assume command of the Fort Apache outpost, he clashes with level-headed Captain Kirby York (John Wayne). Viewing the local Native Americans through an ignorantly negative lens, Thursday is determined to engage them in battle for his own glory, despite the warnings of York -- an act of folly that will have dire consequences.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: The rivalry between two bounty hunters intensifies as they both attempt to track down a destructive device known as the "Hand of God."

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Based on the play by Tennessee Williams, this renowned drama follows troubled former schoolteacher Blanche DuBois (Vivien Leigh) as she leaves small-town Mississippi and moves in with her sister, Stella Kowalski (Kim Hunter), and her husband, Stanley (Marlon Brando), in New Orleans. Blanche's flirtatious Southern-belle presence causes problems for Stella and Stanley, who already have a volatile relationship, leading to even greater conflict in the Kowalski household.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: After moving to a new town, troublemaking teen Jim Stark (James Dean) is supposed to have a clean slate, although being the new kid in town brings its own problems. While searching for some stability, Stark forms a bond with a disturbed classmate, Plato (Sal Mineo), and falls for local girl Judy (Natalie Wood). However, Judy is the girlfriend of neighborhood tough, Buzz (Corey Allen). When Buzz violently confronts Jim and challenges him to a drag race, the new kid's real troubles begin.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Two would-be thieves forge a surprising relationship with a housesitter when they accidentally trap themselves in a house they just broke into.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A spoof of the turmoil that afflicted the movie industry in the late 1920s when movies went from silent to sound. When two silent movie stars', Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont, latest movie is made into a musical a chorus girl is brought in to dub Lina's speaking and singing. Don is on top of the world until Lina finds out.

programme.title: Butterfield 8
programme.desc: A Manhattan call girl (Elizabeth Taylor) has a tragic affair with a rich married man (Laurence Harvey).

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El Tigre Verón
programme.desc: El Tigre Verón, a union leader from the meat industry, must risk everything against his enemies from the bosses' world and justice.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: On a sea voyage to transport breadfruit to Jamaica, English Captain Bligh (Trevor Howard) abuses his crew and officers enough to anger his 1st Lieutenant, Fletcher Christian (Marlon Brando). When they reach their destination, tensions ease and the crew luxuriates in island life until Bligh claps several men in irons for trying to desert. On the trip home, further indignities inspire Christian to stage a mutiny and set Bligh and those loyal to him afloat in a row boat.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: After moving to a new town, troublemaking teen Jim Stark (James Dean) is supposed to have a clean slate, although being the new kid in town brings its own problems. While searching for some stability, Stark forms a bond with a disturbed classmate, Plato (Sal Mineo), and falls for local girl Judy (Natalie Wood). However, Judy is the girlfriend of neighborhood tough, Buzz (Corey Allen). When Buzz violently confronts Jim and challenges him to a drag race, the new kid's real troubles begin.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong

When two silent movie stars', Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont, latest movie is made into a musical a chorus girl is brought in to dub Lina's speaking and singing. Don is on top of the world until Lina finds out.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: Libby Lamm is a former top national security adviser who, while working with a ruthless, steely-willed political veteran, signed off on a controversial military action that was supposed to end the war on terror. The problem: thousands died under false pretenses. Haunted by what she knows, Libby sets out to tell the truth, risking treason -- and her own life -- to expose a cover-up that stretches all the way to the top.

programme.title: Never So Few
programme.desc: Capt. Tom Reynolds (Frank Sinatra) is the leader of a U.S. military intelligence group stationed in Burma, training Kachin revolutionary troops to fight against encroaching Japanese forces during World War II. Tom leaves on another mission, and when he returns, he discovers that his camp has been overrun by Chinese guerrillas who have killed many of his American and Kachin friends. Enraged, Tom leads an unauthorized mission into China to search for the men who killed his fellow soldiers.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is hurtling toward Earth and could mean the end of all human life. The U.S. government keeps the crisis under wraps, but crack reporter Jenny Lerner (Tea Leoni) uncovers the truth -- forcing U.S. President Beck (Morgan Freeman) to announce his plan. Grizzled astronaut Spurgeon "Fish" Tanner (Robert Duvall) and his team will land on the comet and lay explosives, hopefully deterring the object from its doomsday course. If not, humanity will have to prepare for the worst.

programme.title: On the Line
programme.desc: A former detective falls victim to a phone scam. He infiltrates the phishing organization and meets the mastermind behind the crime.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss

programme.title: Scaramouche
programme.desc: When the wicked Marquis de Maynes (Mel Ferrer) kills Andre Moreau's (Stewart Granger) best friend in a sword fighting duel and steals his love, Aline (Janet Leigh), the Frenchman vows revenge. While hiding out with a theatrical troupe and posing as the clown Scaramouche, Moreau works with the Marquis' very own fencing instructor to hone his skill with the sword. Once he feels he's up to task, he returns to the city to claim his revenge and win back Aline.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: Jazz artist C.K. Dexter Haven (Bing Crosby) is still hung up on his ex-wife and neighbor, socialite Tracy Samantha Lord (Grace Kelly), however Tracy is engaged to another man (John Lund). Matters are complicated even further when a magazine reporter (Frank Sinatra), in town to cover Tracy's wedding, also winds up falling for the beautiful bride-to-be. As Tracy tries to decide on the ideal husband, each suitor works hard to convince her he is the best choice.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls
programme.desc: When Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) responded to an ad in New Mexico for a mail-order bride, she had no idea that her would-be husband was a broken-down cowhand. Instead of returning back home, she takes a job at the local Harvey House restaurant. But the new establishment faces tough resistance from the local saloon owner (John Hodiak) and the town's streetwise showgirl, Em (Angela Lansbury). As Susan works with the Harvey girls to win over the townsfolk, she also searches for a new love.

programme.title: Vicious Fun
programme.desc: A horror film critic finds himself in a sticky situation when he stumbles into a self-help group for serial killers.

programme.title: Delivered
programme.desc: Held captive at a remote house, an expectant mother fights for her life against a psychopathic woman who wants her baby.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

programme.title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
programme.desc: The last job of Calvary Captain Nathan Brittles (John Wayne) before retirement is to soothe relations with the Cheyenne and Arapaho Indians after Custer's last stand. At the same time, he must transport the wife (Mildred Natwick) and niece (Joanne Dru) of his commanding officer to a safe destination. After both his missions stall, Brittles attempts a face-to-face meeting with an important Native American chief in order to stave off an impending war.

programme.title: Woman of the Year
programme.desc: Tess Harding (Katharine Hepburn) is a progressively-minded political journalist. Sam Craig (Spencer Tracy) is a sports writer with very traditional values. The only thing the two have in common is that they both work for the same New York City newspaper. Despite an initial and mutual dislike, the two eventually fall in love and get married. When Tess wins the Woman of the Year award, traditional gender roles become flipped and their relationship suffers as a result.

programme.title: Esperando la carroza
programme.desc: Mama Cora's four children argue over who should be forced to care for her in her old age.

programme.title: King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: A rescue party sets out to find an explorer who has disappeared on an African treasure hunt. The search leads the party across the continent and through the terrors of jungle, swamp and desert. Their ultimate destination is the fabled lost mine of Solomon, a source of unimaginable wealth and deadly danger. From H. Rider Haggard's novel.

programme.title: T-34
programme.desc: In 1944, a young lieutenant leads a group of Russian soldiers in a German POW camp and plots a daring escape from captivity in a half-destroyed T-34 tank.

programme.title: Delivered
programme.desc: Held captive at a remote house, an expectant mother fights for her life against a psychopathic woman who wants her baby.

programme.title: Mister Roberts
programme.desc: Bittersweet film about a supply officer aboard a decrepit cargo ship during World War II who yearns for a transfer into a combat zone but is thwarted by the ship's captain, a petty tyrant. Forced to endure various humiliations in exchange for privileges, the crew engage in minor acts of resistance, and look to Mr. Roberts for inspiration and moral support. Based on the hit Broadway play.

programme.title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
programme.desc: The last job of Calvary Captain Nathan Brittles (John Wayne) before retirement is to soothe relations with the Cheyenne and Arapaho Indians after Custer's last stand. At the same time, he must transport the wife (Mildred Natwick) and niece (Joanne Dru) of his commanding officer to a safe destination. After both his missions stall, Brittles attempts a face-to-face meeting with an important Native American chief in order to stave off an impending war.

programme.title: I Confess
programme.desc: Father Logan (Montgomery Clift) is a Catholic priest, but he finds his faith put to the test when he is accused of the murder of a wealthy member of his parish. The real murderer was Otto (O.E. Hasse), a poor German immigrant desperate for money, and Father Logan knows this because Otto confessed it to him. However, Father Logan is bound by the secrecy of the confessional and cannot share this evidence with the police, even if it means his own life.

programme.title: StarDog and TurboCat
programme.desc: Launched into space in 1969, a loyal dog crash-lands in a small town where pets are no longer welcome. Desperate and confused, he soon recruits the help of a tech-savvy cat to help him reunite with his beloved owner.

programme.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
programme.desc: After Brick Pollitt (Paul Newman) injures himself while drunkenly revisiting his high school sports-star days, he and his tempestuous wife, Maggie (Elizabeth Taylor), visit his family's Mississippi plantation for the 65th birthday of his hot-tempered father, Big Daddy (Burl Ives). Cantankerous even with declining health, Big Daddy demands to know why Brick and Maggie haven't yet given him a grandchild, unlike Brick's brother Gooper (Jack Carson) and his fecund wife, Mae (Madeleine Sherwood).

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Wealthy Texas rancher Bick Benedict (Rock Hudson) shakes things up at home when he returns from a trip to the East Coast with a love interest, the refined Leslie Lynnton (Elizabeth Taylor). Bick and Leslie get married, but she clashes with his sister, Luz (Mercedes McCambridge), and wins the admiration of the ambitious young Jett Rink (James Dean). Bick and Jett form a tense rivalry that continues to surface as the years pass and fortunes change in this sweeping drama.

programme.title: Jeremiah Johnson
programme.desc: A Mexican-American War veteran, Jeremiah Johnson (Robert Redford), heads to the mountains to live in isolation. Woefully unequipped for the task at hand, Johnson is fortunate to come across a seasoned mountain man (Will Geer) willing to teach him the necessary survival tactics. As life continues in the mountains, Johnson finds himself a native bride (Delle Bolton) and an adopted son (Josh Albee). However, their peaceful existence is threatened when Johnson incurs the ire of the Crow Indians.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a 23-year-old woman goes missing from a shopping mall in Plano, Texas, her family searches for her, and the police seek out who is responsible for her disappearance.

programme.title: Tennis: ATP Stockholm Open 2025
programme.desc: Awaiting Ugo Humbert in the Stockholm final is second seed Casper Ruud, who remains in the hunt for a fourth ATP Finals appearance. Humbert competes in his 10th tour-level final.

programme.title: Tennis: WTA Ningbo Open 2025
programme.desc: Out to strengthen her bid to reach the WTA Finals, Elena Rybakina targets WTA 500 glory in the Ningbo final as the world number nine meets fellow top-10 star Ekaterina Alexandrova.

programme.title: Tennis: ATP European Open 2025
programme.desc: Felix Auger-Aliassime, in with a chance of qualifying for the year-end ATP Finals, competes for his eighth tour-level crown against last year's European Open finalist Jiri Lehecka.

programme.title: Tennis: ATP & WTA Miami Open 2025
programme.desc: In Miami, the women's final get underway as top seed Aryna Sabalenka meets with home favourite Jessica Pegula in a repeat of last year's US Open decider.

programme.title: Tennis: WTA San Diego Open 2024
programme.desc: British number one Katie Boulter looks to win her first WTA 500 title as she takes on Marta Kostyuk in the final of the San Diego Open. Kostyuk knocked out the top seed to get here. (03.03)

programme.title: Tennis: ATP Tokyo Open 2025
