programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: An elderly woman who died of natural causes was using the identity of a woman who disappeared after being committed to a mental hospital in the 1950s.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A woman loses her fourth son to gang violence, and Lilly determines to stop the cycle and save her remaining child by convicting gang leader Miguel Maldonado.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Recovery of an electronic diary prompts the team to reopen the investigation into the death of a healthy young woman who suffered a stress-induced heart attack when her dot-com company crashed.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Sarah Ashburn (Sandra Bullock) is a methodical investigator with a long-standing reputation for excellence -- and arrogance. In contrast, foul-mouthed, hot-tempered detective Shannon Mullins (Melissa McCarthy) goes with her gut instincts and street smarts to remove criminals from the streets of Boston. Sparks fly when these polar opposites have to work together to capture a drug lord, but in the process, they become the last thing anyone expected -- buddies.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: New York lawyer Vinny has never won a case. When his teenage cousin Bill and his friend Stan are accused of murder in a backwater Alabama town, it's up to the nervous Vinny to save him from jail, even though he's only ever tried personal injury cases before, and none of them successfully.

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: Raised by his overprotective mother, Helen, Bobby Boucher Jr. is the water boy for a successful college football team coached by Red Beaulieu. When Beaulieu fires Bobby, he takes up the same position for a losing rival team, led by despairing Coach Klein. After witnessing Bobby beat up a player who teased him too much, Klein adds him to the roster as a linebacker. Soon, Klein's players are championship contenders.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Thirty-two-year-old Sonny Koufax (Adam Sandler) has spent his whole life avoiding responsibility. But when his girlfriend dumps him for an older man, he's got to find a way to prove he's ready to grow up. In a desperate last-ditch effort, Sonny adopts 5-year-old Julian (Dylan Sprouse), (Cole Sprouse) to impress her. She's not impressed ... and he can't return the kid. Uh-oh for Sonny!

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When decorated military officer Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown in the state of Washington to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a seedy casino operated by one of his old schoolmates, Jay Hamilton. Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Since Dom (Vin Diesel) and Brian's (Paul Walker) heist in Rio left them and their crew very rich people, they've scattered across the globe; however, they must still live as fugitives, unable to return home to their families. Meanwhile, Agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) has been tracking a gang of lethally skilled mercenary drivers whose second-in-command is someone Dom knows. Unable to take them down himself, Hobbs asks Dom and his crew for help in exchange for full pardons for everyone.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Collision
programme.desc: Exciting new matches, more stories and more action, featuring the world-class All Elite Wrestling roster.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: The sequel to the Golden Globe-nominated and AFI Award-winning "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers" follows the continuing quest of Frodo (Elijah Wood) and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam (Sean Astin) discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), the Elf archer Legolas and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

Tolkien classic, "The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King" presents the final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of the future of Middle-earth. Hobbits Frodo and Sam reach Mordor in their quest to destroy the `one ring', while Aragorn leads the forces of good against Sauron's evil army at the stone city of Minas Tirith.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Kong and his protectors undertake a perilous journey to find his true home. Along for the ride is Jia, an orphaned girl who has a unique and powerful bond with the mighty beast. However, they soon find themselves in the path of an enraged Godzilla as he cuts a swath of destruction across the globe. The initial confrontation between the two titans -- instigated by unseen forces -- is only the beginning of the mystery that lies deep within the core of the planet.

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. Their voyage spirals into chaos when a malevolent mining operation threatens their mission and forces them into a high-stakes battle for survival. Pitted against colossal, prehistoric sharks and relentless environmental plunderers, they must outrun, outsmart and outswim their merciless predators.

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanity's victory against the monstrous Kaiju. Jake has since abandoned his training only to become caught up in a criminal underworld. But when an even more unstoppable threat is unleashed to tear through cities and bring the world to its knees, Jake is given one last chance by his estranged sister, Mako Mori, to live up to his father's legacy.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin is put out when he hears a voicemail left for Louisa, inviting her to an interview for a place on a child and adolescent counselling course.

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Stella struggles to come to terms with her ordeal, while Dr Ormerod deals with a dangerous armed man. Elsewhere, Catherine looks forward to married life away from the Royal, and Dr Goodwin thinks his future lies in Africa, until he is visited by a ghost from his past.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventress is concerned about an old flame when her failing marriage looks set to end in tragedy, and Vernon aims to add glamour to the village by organising a Miss Aidensfield competition.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A commune of hippies invoke squatters' rights on a row of holiday cottages, causing dissension in the village, and Vernon sees potential for profit in a potter's wheel.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Jasmine continues to investigate Nicola and is horrified to discover the truth about her husband. Marlon cooks Donna a romantic meal, but she decides to study instead.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Nicola convinces David to agree to go along with her deception. Jamie's plan to impress Louise and Terry backfires and Paddy voices his concerns about Rosemary's whereabouts.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Sally decides she's going to do an `A' level in English Literature. Jerry receives a letter from environmental health saying that a neighbour has complained about the noise. Sally bumps into Casey who's looking after Joshua.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Jamie wonders what's up with Violet as she seems preoccupied. Ashley calls to see Claire and is slightly thrown to find Casey there. Paul asks Leanne for a job as a chef. Ashley begs Claire to return home telling her how much he and Joshua miss her.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The family receive a warm welcome at Duneagle Castle when they visit Rose and her parents in the Highlands but there is no disguising the tensions between their hosts. Back at Downton, Carson is determined to keep the servants working hard, but with a country fair coming up, some may be tempted to push their luck. Romance could be on the cards for Mrs Patmore.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Dr Summerbee has her hands full with a salmonella epidemic in the village, and Vernon spots a way to reach a wider market using Bernie's funeral services.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A beautiful girl at the centre of a political scandal seeks refuge in the village, and David turns Vernon's Christmas decorations into more of a blazing success than he bargained for.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young female member of a new age cult called The Oblong Foundation goes missing, DCI John Barnaby investigates and sends DS Jones undercover at the cult's base, Malham Hall. The police learn that the hall's previous owners, the Lamberts, died in a gas explosion on board their boat. Barnaby and Jones must try to find out what really happened to the Lamberts - and whether the case has a link to the missing woman.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: After seven years of ducking the question, Lewis and Hobson embark on a relationship, but the Oxford detective has a new mystery to solve. Later, on the night of his release from prison, former Oxford don Richard Seager is crushed to death by a car.

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Dr Tony Hill is called to be an expert witness in the multiple-murder trial of Iraq combat vet Darius Grady in Texas. Darius has slaughtered his whole family, but his defence claim he has PTSD and committed the crime while hallucinating. During the trial Tony finds himself at the centre of competing legal and political interests and as his doubts about the case start to fester, he begins to uncover the tragic truth.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: A daily delivery of bespoke Mindfulness content designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: A daily delivery of bespoke Mindfulness content designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: It's a hundred years since the Luxton Bus Company came into being and fifty years since they got their first motor bus. To celebrate the good old days Blakey organizes an exhibition.

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: There are threats, deaths, arson and a staff shortage at the police station. For Frost, anything has to be better than staying at home with an unwelcome guest.

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: An unidentifiable body of a man with a shotgun wound to his head washes up on the low tide mud. Wycliffe and his team are baffled when two separate women have reason to claim the body as that of their missing husbands.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Alice Pengelley visits Poirot in London, telling him she thinks she is being poisoned by her husband. When Poirot arrives in Cornwall the next day to investigate Mrs. Pengelley's charges, he is too late, and finds her dead.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Inspector Lewis investigates the death of Regan Peverill, a brilliant young maths student at Oxford University. The prime suspect is Danny Griffon, an ex-boyfriend and fellow student. Danny is convinced that his uncle has set him up and old case papers belonging to Morse indicate that the Griffon family have a dark secret to hide.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Oxford's last surviving all-female college is bidding farewell to one of its most prominent professors. During a reunion of her brightest students, one of the group is found murdered at the bottom of a flight of stairs. Lewis is convinced that the killing is connected to a brutal attack which occurred ten years before and, as the investigation progresses, he and Hathaway are drawn into the mystery of the college and its secrets.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: In the sleepy English village of St Mary Mead, one man - Colonel Protheroe - is intensely disliked by everyone. Even the vicar has good reason to want to murder him. Then Protheroe is found with a bullet through the head, slumped over the desk in the vicarage study. The obvious suspects seem to be the colonel's wife or her lover - but have they been set up? Miss Marple unpicks the truth behind the crime.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dressed like a bride and drowned in a bath, it triggers a spate of ghoulish wedding-themed murders in Great Worthy. The case takes Barnaby and Jones to a donkey sanctuary, a heritage steam railway and a pub run by an ex-copper and former brothel madam. Could history be repeating itself?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A social services investigator calls on elderly eccentrics William and Mary Bingham, but he is sent away rudely by their daughter Selina and her husband Eddie Stanton. Artist Maggie Viviani also had a run-in with the investigator, so when his body is found in the river, they all come under suspicion. Barnaby learns that the Binghams never recovered from losing their elder daughter and son in a drowning accident.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Quiet life in suburbia takes a dark turn when a woman is found murdered in her garden. When DCI Vera Stanhope discovers that the neighbours aren't all that they seem, buried secrets must be unearthed in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When a popular and well-loved member of a coastal community is violently and deliberately run off the road, DCI Vera Stanhope must investigate the victim's past if she is to stand any chance of finding their killer.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Alice Pengelley visits Poirot in London, telling him she thinks she is being poisoned by her husband. When Poirot arrives in Cornwall the next day to investigate Mrs. Pengelley's charges, he is too late, and finds her dead.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two women looking for siblings but for different reasons - Jeanette Woodyatt's father told her that he had a son who was adopted when he was young. Karen Turnbull was shocked to learn on the day of her mother's funeral that she had half-siblings.

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: It's a hundred years since the Luxton Bus Company came into being and fifty years since they got their first motor bus. To celebrate the good old days Blakey organizes an exhibition.

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Inspector Frost has plenty on his plate when an MP's son is involved in a hit-and-run accident and a casino robbery takes place on the same night. Later, the crisis situation is exacerbated when a police officer goes missing.

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: Wycliffe is summoned to trace a farmer who has disappeared and discovers murder at the heart of a farming community struggling to survive.

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Lewis and Hathaway enter the world of St Gerard's Hall when a visiting female bishop is found dead after drinking poisoned wine. Was she was murdered because her liberal views contradicted those of the reactionary religious leaders of the college - or is something more sinister afoot? When another two deaths occur, both mirroring murders from Jacobean revenge tragedy, Lewis and Hathaway realise that something twisted is afoot.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: An exciting offer for Edith divides opinion, Isobel throws Ethel a lifeline, and new maid Ivy is attracting attention below stairs. Meanwhile, Alfred's interest in particular is resented by Daisy, Anna's perseverance finally pays off, and Matthew's concerns about the estate grow.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Tempers fray as Isobel's kind gesture backfires, while Branson's decisions are put under scrutiny with Mary fighting his corner. Meanwhile, Robert and Cora's relationship suffers, so can Violet make them see things differently? Elsewhere, as Bates's chance of freedom slips away, he goes to extreme lengths.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It is a happy day at Downton as Anna's patience is finally rewarded. Edith has an unexpected admirer and Matthew refuses to back down over his concerns about the management of the estate. Branson's plans for the christening cause consternation in the house, as does the arrival of his brother and O'Brien counsels Thomas.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: There is excitement in the house and village as the annual cricket match approaches, and it brings out Robert's competitive side. As Violet's great niece Rose arrives, a trip to London reveals there is more to her than meets the eye. Thomas's future is in Carson's hands, but Bates may be an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The family receive a warm welcome at Duneagle Castle when they visit Rose and her parents in the Highlands but there is no disguising the tensions between their hosts. Back at Downton, Carson is determined to keep the servants working hard, but with a country fair coming up, some may be tempted to push their luck. Romance could be on the cards for Mrs Patmore.

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: When a secretarial student dies suddenly at home, Endeavour senses that there is more to the case than the initial verdict of heart attack. Now based at Cowley police station, he has become unofficial bagman to DI Thursday but the new superintendent has other ideas. Then a respectable GP is found shot dead in a public lavatory and Endeavour's outlandish theories get him sidelined to general duties.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young female member of a new age cult called The Oblong Foundation goes missing, DCI John Barnaby investigates and sends DS Jones undercover at the cult's base, Malham Hall. Barnaby and Jones must try to find out what really happened to the Lamberts - and whether the case has a link to the missing woman.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When the body of a teenage boy is found in a reservoir in a remote rural town, DCI Vera Stanhope must scrutinise the fractured relationships of the surrounding community to find his killer.

programme.title: The Hack
programme.desc: With the story now in the open, `News International' fight back and threaten Nick and Alan with a smear story. As a new clue surfaces that could further prove phone hacking by senior Murdoch editors, Nick reaches out to his old friend DCS David Cook.

programme.title: The Hack
programme.desc: DCS Dave Cook is forced to work with an unlikely ally from within the tabloids in the form of `The Sun' journalist Mike Sullivan, whose articles bring forward another new lead in career criminal Gary Eaton, who claims to know who planned the murder.

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Stan decides he can make more money if he heads North and gets work in a car factory but, rather than hand in his resignation, he gets Blakey to sack him so that he can get a week's wages.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: Chaos Unchained
programme.desc: The Ninja hurry to the First Land to stop the Forbidden Five from freeing ThunderFang, and Wyldfyre discovers a drastic cure to Roby's decay.

programme.title: The Shatter Dragon
programme.desc: ThunderFang is freed, and only the Ninja stand between the Shatter Dragon of Chaos and his revenge.

programme.title: Prophecy Of The Green Ninja, Greatest Battles
programme.desc: So the final puzzle forces ninja to question the true meaning of the Green Ninja Prophecy. Solving the puzzles releases a new peril for the Ninja to face. Will memories of their greatest victories be enough to defeat it?

programme.title: The Power and the Peril!
programme.desc: Rock star mathematician Ian Malcolm returns to Isla Nublar and helps Claire, Owen and Hudson deal with strange power surges all over Jurassic World.

programme.title: Fistful of Doppelgangers
programme.desc: The Candy Realm is under siege, and the dream chasers are tasked with saving its sugary inhabitants. As they orchestrate a mass evacuation, Mateo and Astrid sneak into the Midnight Raven.

programme.title: Irrational Treasure
programme.desc: The elusive Eye of Confusion has been located, but the dream chasers are not alone in their pursuit. With the Never Witch's doppelgangers on their heels, the team embarks on a frantic treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mission Inplausible
programme.desc: As the Eye of Confusion's power threatens to unravel reality, Logan and Astrid are forced to confront their deepest fears in the Dream Forge.

programme.title: Music “Battle of the Stars”
programme.desc: Nova pulls off a series of pranks, leaving her friends scrambling and laughing. However, things take a dark turn when one of her pranks goes awry and sends the group into a terrifying situation.

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: Marvel Superheroes
programme.desc: Loki arrives at Avengers Tower declaring he wants to be an Avenger. Our heroes are skeptical, but Iron Man decides to make Loki an ”Avenger In Training”. It's a great plan until Thanos arrives on Earth looking for Loki

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous

programme.title: Gorilla's Gone Wild
programme.desc: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water and the Lions and Eagles must come to the rescue. The only problem is that the Lions don't like water ... at all!

programme.title: The Haunted and the Hunted!
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible - but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: Friends Reunite
programme.desc: Olly about how his obsession is affecting their relationships. Olly refuses to see the damage he's causing, but it becomes clear that he's lost touch with what really matters.

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon – but can they trust him?

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro – in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way – they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go “back to school” to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much “fish out of water” at the academy, even with the “cool kids” – Robin and Ava – showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and t

programme.title: The CHI Jackers
programme.desc: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and “Wolf proof ” way to get CHI to the tribes.

programme.title: Symptoms!
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Ninja follow a clue to Arin's location but find a new threat, while Nya, Kai and Wyldfyre spark old grudges in their search for Jay.

programme.title: The Ultimate Object of Admiration
programme.desc: Arin nurses Ras back to health as they continue his training, meanwhile their trail leads the Ninja into more danger.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: Spit Take!
programme.desc: A Dilophosaurus runs loose in the park's hotel, and Owen and Claire must find it before the guests notice - and before Vic's dino-hunting security team can damage the hotel and the guests.

programme.title: Grim Vengeance
programme.desc: The Never Witch's ambitions have darkened, leading her to target the Grim Realm. In an unlikely alliance, the dream chasers must join forces with the Nightmare King and his grimspawn minions.

programme.title: Crown Control
programme.desc: The dream chasers stumble upon the fabled Crown of Control with surprising ease, thanks to an unexpected encounter with the King of the Creatures.

programme.title: The Promised Crown Affair
programme.desc: Izzie has vanished into the dream world, and the dream chasers struggle to maintain normalcy in the waking world while secretly searching for her.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her family's lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force that's far beyond her control.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Out of Darkness

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with her parents, Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behaviour as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.desc: A television executive searching for the ultimate show for his sex-based network comes across `Videodrome', a pirate broadcast of what appears to be pornographic snuff films.
